title: Is This Pin-Up Really of Young Aunt Bee from ‘The Andy Griffith Show’?
subtitle: Before she played Aunt Bee, Frances Bavier had a long career on stage and screen.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: An image shows a young Frances Bavier, the actress who played Aunt Bee Taylor on "The Andy Griffith Show," posing for a pin-up style photo.
